attributes.additional_details:
Become the first country to realistically offer Electric Self Driven cars to the public and get them manufactured and sold in Britain.

This technology will cut costs enormously in the long run. Less money being spent on traffic incidents. Less deaths. Less crime. Green technology.

It would also restore some of the manufactoring industry in Britain and offer great job opportunities.

Make them a realistic option to young drivers by offering attractive deals to own one instead of a manual car.

Allow owners to charge their cars with excess electricity from solar panels or build charging stations. Or invest in the technology that allows cars to charge whilst driving.
